name.baseName: Mine water treatment plant ; Stone Coal ; Stone Coal ; Underground machine mining ; less than or equal to0.3 million t/a; NESPS2
矿井水处理站 ; 石煤 ; 石煤 ; 井工机采 ; 小于等于30万吨/年 ; 中富水矿区 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90
technology.technologicalApplicability: 此数据集描述的是石煤矿井水处理站的工业过程。该过程包括应用于处理废水、石油相关废物和化学需氧量(COD)污染的尾端治理技术。治理技术采用物理方法处理废水和石油相关废物，技术效率达到90%。同样地，针对COD相关污染，采用化学处理方法，效率相同。该设施旨在处理不超过30万吨/年的石煤，主要使用地下机械采矿技术。适用性包括需要针对废水、石油相关废物和COD进行污染控制的类似矿井水处理设施。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码06,三级代码69.0,四级代码690文件，在完整版文件中第30页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste waterisPhysical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是物理处理法，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施正常运行时间（天/年）/企业正常生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisPhysical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of process waste gas purification device / (rated power of process waste gas purification device × process waste gas purification device operating time)
污染物指标石油类的末端治理技术是物理处理法，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施正常运行时间（天/年）/企业正常生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为石油类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
源文件中描述为为石煤，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是化学处理法，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施正常运行时间（天/年）/企业正常生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
